original_title: Story Tellers: An Evening with Colorful Characters
overview: One cold night in the Utah Territory, three opinionated men find themselves sharing a campfire as they tell tales, swap insults, and expound on their personal philosophies. Join Porter Rockwell, Mark Twain, and J. Golden Kimball for an entertaining and enlightening evening with three of the most colorful characters of the Old West.
title: Story Tellers: An Evening with Colorful Characters
